detectors.description:
owned.tranferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirdropTokenGeneration.sol#15-17) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = _newOwner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirdropTokenGeneration.sol#16)

AirdropTokenGeneration.setAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirdropTokenGeneration.sol#34-36) should emit an event for: 
	- amount = _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirdropTokenGeneration.sol#35)

owned.tranferOwnership(address)._newOwner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirdropTokenGeneration.sol#15) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = _newOwner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirdropTokenGeneration.sol#16)
Pragma version^0.4.0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirdropTokenGeneration.sol#1) allows old versions
solc-0.4.21 is not recommended for deployment
